Class Ball

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Ball

public abstract class Ball
extends greenfoot.Actor

A ball is an object that can hit other objects and bounce off the edges of the world (except the bottom edge). It will bounce off of a paddle as well.

Version:
1.0 April 6, 2007
Author:
Barbara Ericson Georgia Tech
